• Lola Digital

    • Folio About

    UAP

    It was very special to work with the behemoth creative that is Urban Art Projects. Together we made a website that celebrated their vibrant and extensive folio of public works around the world. The end result was an absolute beast of a site, carefully indexing tonnes of content showcasing their builds and collaborators, also available in Mandarin for their growing international operations.

    • Rebrand
    • UI UX
    • Content Strategy

    Hi my name is Pamela, I'm a designer and now developer who's been working in the space of digital design and branding for over 10 years.

    I'm a bit of an alien but I have an open mind and I love a good challenge. My design practice and experience spans across multiple disciplines because I enjoy the flexibility of being able to do all the things and evolving alongside new technologies, most recently in the areas of full-stack development and 3D. Iâ€™ve spent the last 4 years freelancing and starting DIY non-for-profit projects within my local arts, music and film community in Meanjin Brisbane. Fostering underground culture and community is at the centre of what I love to do. I am also a ceramic artist making one-of-a-kind lamps under the moniker Queena Grot and play in a punk band called Guppy.

    Pamela sits in her faithful computer chair in her room.

    To recognise that I live, work and benefit from systems built on stolen Jagera and Turrbal country is an important step towards true reconcilliation with First Nations people, the traditional owners of this land. Without recognition of their wisdom and eternal connection to country we risk being stuck in cycles of the past and never truly moving forward together with the kind of grace that would benefit everyone in this country and is worth fighting for.

    Pamela C 2022
